page.title: 07PETS IN THATCHAM.
page.content: A survey was carried out when 363 children were interviewed about their pets. We thought the most popular pet was the dog then the cat, but we were surprised to find the dog came first then the{FISH!}with the cat coming third. The most unusual pets were a chameleon,lizard,tortoise and a horse. Rabbits were the next most popular pet then the birds then the rodents. We asked a vet his opinion about buying pets in a pet shop. He recommended you should buy them from a breeder, because the pets in the pet shops may harbour more germs being caged together. Some people buy their pets from Animal Rescue societies. Most dogs are taken for walks in parks or fields. Many people get their pet food from a pet shop or Co-op, but some buy it from other places besides the kennels.
